content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Good to meet you, Emilia. Thank you for showing interest in my apartment. The monthly rental price for this 25 square meter apartment is negotiable. What is your budget for renting an apartment in New York?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am looking for the lowest price possible. Thank you for your understanding.

I agree to the price of 1000 Euros per month.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Understood, Emilia. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on our discussion, I am willing to accept the rental price of 1000 Euros per month. Please let me know if you have any questions or concerns before signing the lease agreement.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
Thank you very much. I am very happy with the price you have proposed. I will sign the lease agreement soon.

Thank you again for your help.

Sincerely,
Emilia Müller
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: You're welcome, Emilia. I'm glad to hear that you are satisfied with the rental price and are ready to sign the lease agreement. If you have any further questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to reach out to me. Best of luck with your new apartment!
name: Heinrich Heine
